law.catch_line: The Board shall place the holder of a general license to practice dentistry or a general license to ...

section.section:
The Board shall place the holder of a general license to practice dentistry or a general license to practice dental hygiene on inactive status and issue an inactive status registration certificate to the licensee, if the licensee:
Submits to the Board an application for inactive status on the form required by the Board; and
Pays to the Board the inactive status application fee set by the Board.
A licensee on inactive status may not practice dentistry or dental hygiene in this State.

text.section:
The Board shall waive the examination requirements of §§ 4-302 and 4-305 of this subtitle for:
A dentist on inactive status who applies for a general license to practice dentistry, if the dentist has practiced dentistry regularly in any other state within 3 years of applying for the license; or
A dental hygienist on inactive status who applies for a general license to practice dental hygiene, if the dental hygienist has practiced dental hygiene regularly in any other state within 3 years of applying for the license.
